title: Lavrov: Russia has no concrete evidence about what happened to Skripal
text:
Lavrov: Russia has no concrete evidence about what happened to Skripal Friday, March 09, 2018 - 00:42 
Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said Russia would cooperate in the case of Sergei Skripal but so far Russian officials had not received concrete evidence about what happened to him. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said Russia would cooperate in the case of Sergei Skripal but so far Russian officials had not received concrete evidence about what happened to him. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2Ihn74C
